member.name: T:Syncfusion.PivotConverter.NamespaceDoc
member.summary: The Syncfusion.PivotConverter namespace contains classes that provides the functionality of exporting the Essential PivotGridControl to an Excel sheet, a PDF or to a Word document.

member.name: T:Syncfusion.PivotConverter.ExcelExport
member.summary: Implements the exporting functionality of the Pivot data to Excel sheet with the applied style.
